ygData.subject: Stacking & RPing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Fair enough, but what about if you re playing one song on some instrument & singing the lyrics and then add a line a two from another song that happens to
ygData.messageBody:
Olczyk wrote:
>I am also a RL musician, and i don't think that anyone, no matter what
>you try to say on here, sings one verse of one song, then one verse of
>another song, then the second verse of the first song, then the second
>verse of the second song, etc.

Fair enough, but what about if you're playing one song on some instrument &
singing the lyrics and then add a line a two from another song that happens
to be in the same key? (If you're old enough to recall Live Aid, I'm
referring to what U2 did singing Ruby Tuesday over Bad)

Not trying to nit-pick, just that I'm also into the rp side of it & don't
think stacking is necessarily out of character.
